$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.p: Contribute to student programs and activities at Phoenix Union High School District, and youll be paid back with a dollar-for-dollar tax credit. And youll help guarantee that our students experience all that high school has to offer.

a.title: Go to comments for Arizona Education Tax Credit

div.span: You can now request transcripts and student records online. Go to

a.title: Go to comments for Request Transcripts Online

a.span: Phoenix Union Foundation for Education launches PXU Apparel Shop

div.p: The Phoenix Union Foundation for Education has created a COVID-19 Emergency Relief Fund and an apparel shop to help raise funds.

a.title: Go to comments for Phoenix Union Foundation for Education launches PXU Apparel Shop

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.strong: Welcome to Phoenix Union High School District!

img.title: Welcome to Phoenix Union High School District
img.alt: Welcome to Phoenix Union High School District

div.em: Click above to watch the video

div.span: Phoenix Union High School District is one of the largest high school districts in the country, with 20 schools, over 27,000 students, and nearly 3,000 employees. Phoenix Union covers 220-square miles of Arizonas capital city.

div.div: Our Mission: Preparing every student for success in college, career, and life

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.p: is just around the corner. Sign up today for Freshman Academy or Summer School for continuing students. Click here to visit the PXU Summer School page.For any questions, please email summerschool@phoenixunion.org.

a.title: Go to comments for Summer School 2020

div.span: Our high schools have it all more classes, more specialized programs, more support and more opportunities than any other school district. Make new friends and hang with your old friends; create memories;
your expectations. This is an exciting time for you. Our job is to prepare every stud
ent for success in college, career and life. Your job is to take advantage of all Phoenix Union has to offer.
with us and youll have the EXPERIENCE of a Lifetime.
To apply online or download the form, please visit

a.title: Go to comments for OPEN ENROLLMENT is Available!

h3.strong: Learn About the Gifted & Talented Academy, Our Newest Micro School.

a.title: Go to comments for New Schools Opening!
Go to comments for News Buttons

p.span: WEBSITE ACCESSIBILITY: The Phoenix Union High School District is committed to ensuring accessibility of its website for students, parents, and members of the community with disabilities. We strive to ensure our websites conform to the W3C/WAls Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Level AA Conformance.

To request assistance or report a problem related to website accessibility, pleasecontact pxumarketing@phoenixunion.orgor 602-764-1528.If applicable, please include the web address or URL and the specific problems you have encountered.
